title: My first 3D Project
description: One of my current projects that I am working on as a lead programmer on a team.
content: This is a project I am working on with Artifex Interactive. It is my most recent project as of writing this blog, I lead the Project Management by keeping tabs on tasks and their deadlines while also leading the Programming team day-to-day. title: My First Game
description: My very first original game project that I made during high school.
content: Defrain is the first original game I conceived from scratch.
